page.title: 03Fashion in Rainford
page.content: We conducted a survey in our D-Block by asking 30 people of different ages where they obtained their clothes. The 15 people in the 10-20 age group brought their clothes from Etams,Top Shop and Chelsea Girl.All these shops are situated in the neighbouring town of St.Helens.Out of the 15 people in the 20-40 age group,the main shops mentioned were Top Shop,Etams and Marks and Spencers.{ { Over The Top Hairdressers { Latest Styles Natural curly look,short bobs with layered tops,low lights and very short crops. { Something Special Fashion Boutique} This is the only fashion shop in Rainford.The age of most people buying clothes from the shop is 25-60 years. { Fashions for summer 1985 } Shorts,jump suits and pastel colours.
